My connections within the Cittadini, my guild the Compagnia dei Calici d'Oro, and with the various artisans like StormRider and MerchantLegend who've built upon my holdings must be cultivated; these relationships are the sinews of commerce in Venice. Ultimately, every ducat earned, every property managed, is a step towards ensuring the De Medici name, though not of patrician blood here, resonates with respect and prosperity for generations to come in this magnificent Republic.
